Title: Establishes and redefines offenses involving fraud, scheme to defraud and larceny; repealer
Summary: Establishes and redefines offenses involving fraud, scheme to de-fraud and larceny.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing and redefining offenses involving fraud, scheme to defraud and larceny; and to repeal sections 190.60 and 190.65 of such law relating thereto
